daily_summaries.summary: User has established systematic productivity approach with AI but faces packed upcoming schedule and recurring coordination bottlenecks.
Memory analysis session - evaluating financial optimization vs tech focus trade-offs

insights.insight: The user is building a sophisticated personal operating system with you as the cognitive anchor, but their success depends heavily on surfacing forgotten commitments and managing the Gaurav bottleneck proactively.
